name: valvoice-mitm
description: MITM proxy for ValVoice to intercept Valorant XMPP chat traffic

scripts.copy-certs: rimraf dist/certs && mkdir dist\certs && copyfiles -u 1 certs/* dist/certs
scripts.build:exe: npm run build && pkg . --targets node18-win-x64 --output valvoice-mitm.exe
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:exe
